message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $2,000,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth.

I appreciate the enthusiasm, Alice, but I'm not sure I can meet your starting price. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think that's a reasonable price considering the value I've seen in similar products.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the value. To be fair to both of us, I can go down to $1,800,000.  This product has unique advantages that I'm confident will bring you significant return on investment.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not convinced that this product is worth $1,800,000 to me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $1,000,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
